title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) maximum

1 point is earned for the correct volume.

M1V1 = M2V2

V2 = (0.150M)(0.100L) / 0.400M

V2 = 0.0375 L x (1000 mL/1L) = 37.5 mL

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 point(s) maximum

1 point is earned for using the buret to measure 37.5 mL of 0.400 M CuSO4 solution.

1 point is earned for adding the CuSO4 solution to the volumetric flask and filling to the mark with distilled water.

Use the buret to dispense 37.5 mL of CuSO4 solution into the volumetric flask. Fill to the mark with distilled water.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) maximum

1 point is earned for a correct wavelength.

700 nm (Any wavelength from 650 to 700 nm is acceptable.)
